name: imagegd2
purpose: Output GD2 image to browser or file

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description: This function requires GD 2.0.1 or later (2.0.28 or later is recommended).

The GD2 format is commonly used to allow fast loading of parts of images.
    Note that the GD2 format is only usable in GD2-compatible applications.
